title: Diary of the late Rajah of Kolhapoor, during his visit to Europe in 1870.
author: Rajah Ram Chuttraputtee
snippet: Then we drove to Dr. G 's at Newbattle whereI took my luncheon. Afterwards we walked to Newbattle Abbey, the*seat of the Marquis of Lothian. It is a very old and historical place.

title: Early Travellers in Scotland. Edited by P. Hume Brown. [With maps.]
author: Brown, Peter Hume.
snippet: 1 Now called Morrison's Haven, the harbour of Prestonpans. It was builtby the monks of Newbattle Abbey for the exportation of coal from Prestongrange, and was originally known as Newhaven.
